response:
Young age with multifocal central nervous system involvement (optic nerve plus midbrain) makes an inflammatory demyelinating process most likely, but acute vascular and structural midbrain causes must be rapidly excluded because they carry urgent treatment implications.

differential_diagnosis = ["Relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis", "Right midbrain infarct (posterior cerebral artery territory)", "Right midbrain cavernous malformation or intraparenchymal haemorrhage", "Neurosarcoidosis involving optic nerve and brainstem", "Primary midbrain glioma or other brainstem tumour"]
